comments.author: Shanna
comments.content: Whaaaaaah YOU made it!!!!! I'm Proud of my Big brother!!!

comments.author: Kamil
comments.content: Congrats, now you have to go to Cairo, New Delhi, New Orleans, Shanghai and Karachi...I've only been to Karachi...not even Shanghai...! Well done! Now you've got a great story to tell the chicks about :P

comments.author: Geekly
comments.content: Congratulations!!!  I've followed the entire account of your trip and it was both entertaining and inspiring.  I think you've accomplished a great thing.

comments.author: vincent
comments.content: Sitting in my comfortable chair behind my computer it was great fun reading your cycling stories. You did it. Congratulations!

comments.author: Wendy
comments.content:
Congrats!!!You made it!

comments.author: Loïc
comments.content:
Well done Randy!
It has been very interesting to read your trip stories.

What you were looking for during this trip might be that French superpower of clairvoyance ? ;)
At least, I guess it will help you to answer questions and see a clearer future path! as it seems you took some decisions.
See you!

comments.author: Alvaro
comments.content:
I am very happy for you Randy, you finished an amazing adventure!

I look forward to the next milestone in your life after Sata Misaki
